name: ATLANTA COMMUNITY FOOD BANK
sampleDescriptions: Discussion drafts of the 2018 Farm Bill, all provisions related to federal nutrition policies.
H. R. 2 and S. 3042, the Agriculture and Nutrition Act of 2018 (also known as Agriculture Improvements Act of 2018), all provisions related to federal nutrition policy.
